briefTitle: A Multicenter and Real-world Analysis of RC48-ADC in Patients With HER2-positive or HER2-low Expressing, Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Multicenter and Real-world Analysis of Clinical Outcomes and Safety of the Novel Recombinant Humanized Anti-HER2 Therapeutic Antibody RC48-ADC in Patients With HER2-positive or HER2-low Expressing, Locally Advanced or Metastatic Breast Cancer
